content: ** we re hosting a cal for felici on the double cowl in the row & roses ravelry group starting on january 1st 2020 come join us https //www ravelry com/groups/row--roses-group ** this pattern is also free on my blog if you ll click the visit website link there are not nearly enough crochet patterns written for felici in my opinion so i wrote one this pattern is meant to be totally laid back and stress-free use whatever hook gives the the fabric you like best add or subtract chains in sets of 10 to make it wider or narrower just know that whenever you change it your yarn requirements may change as well i wrote this for 2 balls of felici held double and stitched up at the same time use two of the same colorway or two different ones i chose soft serve and coffee break for mine share your fo on facebook and instagram with hashtag #felicionthedouble so we can all be inspired by your color combos
